definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: hunting implement, specif. net (cf. Syr. ms.iydto0, Targum [[מְחַדְתָּא]], net);—only fig.: cstr. [[מְחוֹד רָעִים]] Pr 12:12 (but text dub., v. conj. in Toy); sf. [[מְחוּדוֹ]] Job 19:5 (of God as Job's hunter); pl. [[מְחוֹדִים וַחֲרָמִים לִנׇּהּ]] Ec 7:26 (of woman).
